dt: {bc}a nation, state, or other political unit: such as
{bc}one founded on law and united by compact or tacit agreement of the people for the {a_link|common} good
{bc}one in which supreme authority is vested in the people
used officially of Kentucky, Massachusetts, Pennsylvania, and Virginia
{bc}a political unit having local autonomy but voluntarily united with the U.S.
used officially of Puerto Rico and of the Northern Mariana Islands
{bc}an association of self-governing autonomous states more or less loosely associated in a common allegiance (as to the British crown)
{bc}the English state from the death of Charles I in 1649 to the Restoration in 1660

shortdef: a nation, state, or other political unit: such as
one founded on law and united by compact or tacit agreement of the people for the common good
one in which supreme authority is vested in the people
